features: Twin Bed with Storage: Featuring two generously sized storage drawers beneath the twin bed with drawers, purposefully designed for organizing clothes, blankets, books, and bedroom essentials. A practical platform bed with storage drawers, ensuring a clutter-free space whenever necessary.

Durable Daybed: Constructed primarily from solid pine wood, renowned for its resilience to humidity changes and preventing cracks. Engineered with 8 robust support slats, sturdy legs, and wide boards, providing exceptional stability and elevating weight capacity to 250lbs.

Convenient Twin Daybed: With dimensions of 77.1''Lx 40.7''Wx 23.1''H and a bed size of 40.7''x 77.1'', this twin bed frame with drawers with storage effortlessly complements diverse decor styles. Ideal for children's bedrooms, guest rooms, or compact living areas, offering functionality without compromising on style.

Design: Boasting an elegant and minimalistic design, this sophisticated twin storage bed effortlessly adapts to any decorating style. Perfectly suitable for kids' rooms, guest rooms, bedrooms, and living rooms, providing a versatile furniture solution for various household needs.

User-Friendly Assembly: Simplified assembly process requiring minimal effort. The twin bed with storage arrives complete with all necessary hardware and clear instructions for hassle-free setup. Should you have any inquiries, our dedicated customer service team stands ready to assist you promptly and effectively.
body.description: Our Twin Size Platform Bed, a blend of functionality and elegance. Crafted from high-quality pine wood and MDF, this bed ensures safety and durability for long-term use.Versatile and practical, this exquisite and simple design makes it suitable for the living room or bedroom, enhancing the ambiance with its clean lines and white finish. The bed's unique feature lies in its two large drawers, providing ample storage space underneath, ideal for organizing items and optimizing room space.Convenience meets innovation as these drawers are equipped with wheels, offering flexible placement on both sides of the bed, adapting to your room layout effortlessly.Specifications:Material: Pine wood+MDFSize: TwinColor: WhiteNumber of slats: 8Function: With two drawersNumber of packages: 1Spring box: Not neededAssembly Required: YesOrigin: VietnamDimensions:Product Dimension: 77.1''L x 40.7''W x 23.1''HBed: 40.7''x 77.1''Total Height: 23.1''Drawer: 36.8''x 17.6''Overall Product Weight: 68.5lbWeight Capacity: 250lbSuggested Mattress Thickness: 6''

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our White Twin Size Platform Bed, designed for those who appreciate simplicity, style, and practicality. Crafted from high-quality pine wood and MDF, this bed is as safe as it is stylish. Its elegant design is complemented by two convenient drawers, providing ample storage space while saving valuable room real estate.

TWIN SIZE DAYBED WITH 2 DRAWERS Twin Size Platform Bed in white, crafted from high-quality pine wood and MDF, featuring an exquisite, space-saving design with two large drawers on wheels, ideal for versatile placement in living rooms or bedrooms, ensuring durability and convenience with a weight capacity of 250lbs. Specifications: Overall Product Dimension: 77.1''L x 40.7''W x 23.1''H Bed: 40.7''x 77.1'' Total Height: 23.1'' Drawer: 36.8''x 17.6'' Weight Capacity: 250lb Suggested Mattress Thickness: 6'' Number of slats: 8 Spring box: Not needed

Safety and Durability Safety and durability go hand in hand with this bed. Crafted from high-quality pine wood and MDF, it's built to last, ensuring long-lasting use and reliability. You can trust its strength and sturdiness, making it an investment for years to come. Easy Assembly and No Need for a Box Spring Assembling this bed is a breeze, and you won't need a box spring. It's a hassle-free way to transform your space, and it comes with all the necessary hardware for straightforward installation. Two Spacious Drawers for Maximum Utility This single-layer bed doesn't compromise on storage. It features two large drawers with wheels, offering a convenient and space-saving solution for stashing away your belongings. No more clutter - just an organized and tidy space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars High degree of difficulty
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were not helpful. No video to watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame took two people about 30 minutes to assemble, and was really beginner friendly. We did end up using an electric drill for a few parts which sped up the process a bit, but ultimately it worked really well. The castors for the underbed drawers are super smooth, and pull out all the way, so the space behind the drawers can still be used. The bed is pretty sturdy, it holds me with no problems, and fits my mattress with the perfect amount of room to spare on all sides for bedding.
